main event: A UFO sighting was reported near Phoenix, Arizona on August 2, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as elliptical or circular in shape, the size of a Piper Cub aircraft.
The color of the object varied from black to gray.
A slight pulsation or indentations were observed around the edge of the bottom of the object.
Smoke and a reddish glow were observed coming from the object.
Observers used binoculars to view the object.
